poem:
"Ode to the Unseen Cycles We Navigate"

How funny and tragic, the ways 
in which we one day awaken 
to the secrets our bodies have been speaking.
Invisible tides ebbing, flowing
in the hidden calendars of our flesh.
Only through the lens of pain 
do we finally understand,
that which has been whispering, 
all along,
in the language of blood and time.
